mapper.select: select * from (select rowNum rn, a.* from (select * from free_board where del = 'n' and category = #{category} order by free_no desc) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from free_board where category = #{category} and del = 'n'
mapper.update: update free_board set category = #{category}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where free_no = #{free_no}
update free_board set del = 'y' where free_no = #{free_no}
mapper.select: select max(free_no) from free_board where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: update free_board set cnt = cnt+1 where free_no = #{free_no}
mapper.select: select * from (select rowNum rn, a.* from (select * from free_board where cnt > #{cnt} and del = 'n' order by free_no desc) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from free_board where cnt > #{cnt} and del = 'n'
